metadata.title: CVE-2021-46168 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Spin v6.5.1 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds write in lex() at spinlex.c.

notes.note: sbeattie> fix is incomplete, it bumps up the array size but still does not apply a limit

criterions.comment: spin package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
